cinnamon.engine.utils

Interface PivotableEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, Partitionable, Position, Rotation, Size
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolygonEntity

    public interface PivotableEntity
extends Entity

    PivotableEntities allow the Entity's pivot property to be changed through setPivot(float, float).

    It should be noted that the pivot does not immediately alter the position. The pivot is added during transformations on position, size, and rotation in order to alter the object's origin and thus the transformation's result.

    Created by chris on 6/19/2017.

    • Method Summary

        Throws:
